name: Marc Moreno Maza
content: Marc Moreno Maza's Homepage Home Research Books and Papers Software Posters Talks Teaching Students Scholarly Activities Marc Moreno Maza I am a Professor in the Computer Science Department and the Applied Mathematics Department at the University of Western Ontario, and a Principal Scientist in the Ontario Research Centre for Computer Algebra (ORCCA). Please follow the links above for further information. Contact Email: moreno@csd.uwo.ca Phone: +1 519 661-2111 (ext. 86891) Fax: +1 519 661-3515 Address: Department of Computer Science Middlesex College, Rooms 327 and 383 The University of Western Ontario London, Ontario, Canada N6A 5B7 Office Hours: Tuesdays 13:30 - 15:30 Yellow Dragon Waterfall, Jiu Zhai Gou, Sichuan China, 2009 BPAS CUMODP Meta_Fork RegularChains Library PowerSeries Library Z-Polyhedra Library The PolyhedraSets Library The ProgramAnalysis Library Last modified on September 7, 2012.
